import React from "react"; function GeneratedSignature({ fullName, jobTitle, phoneNumber, emailAddress, address, color, // Add this prop }) { return ( {/* Top Left Quadrant: Logo */} {/* Top Right Quadrant: Social Media Icons */} {/* Bottom Left Quadrant: Personal Info */}
{/* Align them in a row */}

{fullName}

{jobTitle}

{phoneNumber} | {emailAddress}

); } export default GeneratedSignature;
